p: Two complete ORFs of CHIKV were extracted from the complete viral sequences for the phylogenetic analysis. Multiple sequence alignments of the individual ORFs were computed using MAFFT [ 39] under default settings and visualized in AliView [ 40]. In order to examine the possibility of recombinant sequences, we used RDP and methods therein (RDP, GENECONV, Bootscan, MaxChi, Chimaera, SiScan, and PhylPro) [ 41].
